name: DEAD SKY (itch)
description:
DEAD SKY is an abstract alien landscape generator. you play as a time traveler stranded four billion years in the future, wandering a series of strange and empty worlds.

the game features procedurally generated planets, which can be swampy, mountainous, rocky, and so on. it also features procedurally generated ambient music, arranged from a library of samples.

if you want to go to a new planet, follow your radar to the black spire. press F9 to take pictures of anything pretty you find!!
